content: What is Instagram?Instagram is a popular social media core site that allows users to share and discover visual content. Images can be edited or left in their original form, and they can be accompanied by short captions or not at all. Users can follow each other to see daily posts and engage in discussions with other members nearby or across the globe. The platform can be used for several business purposes, including building brand awareness, increasing engagement, and driving traffic to your website. As a visual platform, Instagram is an excellent tool for showcasing products and services, fostering brand relationships, and attracting new customers.How to Grow Your Audience on InstagramInstagram has more than 700 million users, so it’s a good idea for businesses to explore ways to increase their following. The easiest way to do this is to ask your customers, subscribers, and other interested groups to follow your account. When you first start off, it’s best to avoid posting promotional content. Instead, you can use these posts to create a sense of community around your brand. Create an account that your followers will want to engage with on a regular basis. social media core
